program:
# Your program goes here
.begin
% R 3
- r 1
set #botchoice r
outsc #msg #endmsg
halt

inp
- r 60
set #usrchoice r

outsc #ychoose #endychoose
~ *#usrchoice 1
jmp #post_rock r
outsc #r #endr
jmp #post_scissors 1
.post_rock
~ *#usrchoice 2
jmp #post_paper r
outsc #p #endp
jmp #post_scissors 1
.post_paper
set #usrchoice 3
outsc #s #ends
.post_scissors
out &nl 1

outsc #ichoose #endichoose
jmp #post_rock1 *#botchoice
outsc #r #endr
jmp #post_scissors1 1
.post_rock1
~ *#botchoice 1
jmp #post_paper1 r
outsc #p #endp
jmp #post_scissors1 1
.post_paper1
set #botchoice 3
outsc #s #ends
.post_scissors1

# Conditional Checking
- *#usrchoice 1
~ r *#botchoice
jmp #post_tie r

.post_tie
outsc #tie #endtie

.end
halt

jmp #begin 1
mmap:
# Allocated memory for your program goes here
.toprint
_1
.usrchoice
_1
.botchoice
_1
constant:
# Constant values for your program go here
.r
'rock
:endr

.p
'paper
:endp

.s
'scissors
:ends

.ychoose
'You chose 
:endychoose

.ichoose
'I chose 
:endichoose

.win
'Yay! You win.
:endwin

.lose
'Ha ha!
:endlose

.tie
'It's a tie!
:endtie

.reset
'Press any key to play again...
:endreset

.msg
'Play rock, paper, scissors!
&nl
'Choose either:
&nl
'1) Rock
&nl
'2) Paper
&nl
'3) Scissors
&nl
:endmsg
